TopicTitle: kOS Script/Program Repositoy? IS there one?

Articles.Content: Basically I'm wondering if there is a site, or place where people have shared their various kOS scripts, for others to use, or to help others learn how to make a script they want by looking over similar scripts others have made, I also am not sure if this is the right forum or not, but I thought it would be the closest spot since it is almost a "General Add-on" Question I had in a way.
I want there to exist one. There have been several people claiming to set one up but then they stop updating with little explanation.
I found a lot of "Mission aid scripts" on the wiki, but other then that and some scripts people uploaded there, not much otherwise.
Yes, [there is a site](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82465-WIP-The-kOS-Repository-Now-with-100-more-registrations!). However it never really got finished
